title: Grid Frequency Stability Monitoring
description: A system operator is monitoring grid frequency in real-time to ensure the balance between generation and load.

tasks.description: Continuously monitor the system frequency from synchrophasor data.
tasks.expected_outcome: System displays a live chart of the grid frequency.

tasks.description: The system detects a sudden drop in frequency following the unexpected trip of a large power plant.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a critical frequency deviation alarm.

tasks.description: Automatically deploy fast-acting frequency response services from batteries and other resources to arrest the frequency decline.
tasks.expected_outcome: System dispatches ancillary services to stabilize the grid.
